definition: one of the twelve animals symbolic of the earthly branches 地支[di4 zhi1]/animal from the Chinese zodiac
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
birth year as designated by animal symbols (mouse, ox, tiger etc)

sentences.english: There is an interesting folktale about how the order of the 12 animals was determined.
sentences.chinese: 民間有種關於12生肖順序的有趣傳說。

sentences.english: On the Chinese calendar every year has an animal'sname.
sentences.chinese: 在農曆中，每年都有一個生肖。

sentences.english: In Tokyo window cleaners dress up as the animals of the Chinese zodiac.
sentences.chinese: 在東京，窗戶清潔工們打扮成了中國十二生肖的模樣。

sentences.english: This is the first time that stamps portraying Chinese zodiac animals have been issued globally.
sentences.chinese: 這是聯合國首次全球發行中國生肖題材郵品。

sentences.english: The lion king called the twelve zodiac meeting to discuss what row seating.
sentences.chinese: 獅子大王召集十二生肖開會，商量排座次的事。

sentences.english: Hence, sometimes I try to figure out myself through horoscopes, zodiacs, etc by hoping they can help me in understanding myself.
sentences.chinese: 所以，有時會通過星座生肖等，去推敲自己的性格。

sentences.english: And how does a westerner see each of the 12 animals in the Chinese zodiac?
sentences.chinese: 但是西方人是怎麼看待中國的黃曆中的十二生肖呢？

sentences.english: Oh's birth year zodiac as a horse thus PONY and his love of brown color.
sentences.chinese: Oh的出生年生肖屬馬和他喜愛顏色褐色的組合。

sentences.english: The Chinese zodiac operates on a rotation of 12 different signs, or animals.
sentences.chinese: 中國的黃道十二宮12生肖一輪迴。

sentences.english: However, both of them are fixed signs of the Zodiac.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他們都是十二生肖的象徵。

sentences.english: I am a Rabbit and the coming year is the year of the Rabbit. What does it mean for me?
sentences.chinese: 節，我的生肖是兔。兔年對我來說，有什麼意味嗎？

sentences.english: Their zodiacs are "quite compatible, " according to Chen.
sentences.chinese: 他們的生肖“完好合”，根據陳姓風水師說。

sentences.english: The Jade Emperor was very pleased with the actions of the dragon, and he was added into the zodiac cycle.
sentences.chinese: 龍的行爲讓玉帝非常高興，龍也加入了生肖中。

sentences.english: Zhu Yihua is already f with the 12 animal signs of the Chinese horoscope.
sentences.chinese: 朱意花早已熟悉中國星象中的12個動物生肖。

sentences.english: The "Year of the Dragon" is one of the 12 zodiac symbols associated with the Chinese Lunar Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 龍年是中國農曆中的十二生肖年之一。

sentences.english: For example, twelve animal, liked by all time people.
sentences.chinese: 例如，十二生肖，被很多時候的人喜歡。

definition: colloquial term for 生肖[sheng1 xiao4] the animals associated with the years of a 12-year cycle
birth year as designated by animal symbols (mouse, ox, tiger etc)
to make easy money/to make a fortune/to line one's pockets
luck with the ladies/a romance/good luck
profits pouring in from all sides (idiom)/raking in money/bonanza
Year of the Ox or Bull (e.g. 2009)
